titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States establishing English as the official language of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary:
1/17/2007--Introduced.
Constitutional Amendment - Establishes English as the official language of the United States.
